advancements.crusty_anchor_ad.title: A sea of strength!
advancements.fighters_binding_ad.title: Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee
advancements.sinister_sword_ad.title: Spooky Scary
advancements.stormlander_ad.title: A calm and reasonable weapon
gamerule.cursedAxeExplotionPower.descrip: Change the power of the explosion for the CursedAxe
gamerule.fortunePickaxe.description: Changes Pickaxe Unique from Looting 4 to Fortune 4
gamerule.stormlanderGriefing.description: Stormlander will summon real lightning and cause fire
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.anchor.descript: §7Those strong enough to wield the Anchor in battle follow the tradition of legendary seafaring warriors.
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.battlestaff.des: §7The battlestaff is a perfectly balanced staff that is ready for any battle.
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.battlestaff_gro: §7A staff that grows and shifts as it attacks
§7the Growing Staff is unpredictable and powerful.
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.bone_cudgel_scy: §7The Bone Cudgel is old enough to be considered an ancient treasure
§7but still menacing even by modern standards.
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.boneclub_scythe: §7Those who wield a Bone Club prefer as less-subtle approach to problem-solving.
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.broad_sword_cla: §7Only those with the strength of a champion and the heart of a hero can carry this massive blade.
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.claymore.descri: §7A massive sword that seems impossibly heavy yet rests easily in a just warrior's hands.
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.cursed_axe_doub: §7poisonous axe leaves their victims sick for years with just a single scratch.
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.cutlass.descrip: §7This curved blade, wielded by the warriors of the Squid Coast, requires a steady hand in battle.
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.dagger.descript: §7Daggers are the weapon of cravens - or so folk say.
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.double_axe.desc: §7A devastating weapon fit for barbaric fighters.
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.encrusted_ancho: §7This Encrusted Anchor was lost at sea long ago and has become harsh and corrosive during its ages of neglect.
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.fangs_of_frost_: §7These lauded twin daggers of the northern mountains are known to freeze their foes to solid ice.
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.fighters_bindin: §7Made in the wilds beyond the mountains
§7these gauntlets have been worn by warriors for centuries.
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.firebrand_axe.d: §7Crafted in the blackest depths of the Fiery Forge and enchanted with fiery powers.
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.fist.descriptio: §7Gauntlets call back to an ancient style of hand to hand combat.
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.great_hammer.de: §7Blacksmiths and soldiers alike use the Great Hammer for its strength in forging and in battle.
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.great_hammer_of: §7embedded with a crystal that harnesses the power of gravity
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.mace.descriptio: §7The Mace is a brutal tool of war and what it lacks in finesse; it makes up for in power.
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.nameless_blade_: §7This deadly blade's story was lost to the endless sands of time.
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.nightmares_bite: §7The twin blades of Nightmare's Bite drip with deadly venom
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.reinforced_diam: §7Diamond is one of the most durable materials
§7making it an excellent choice for a pickaxe.
§7The Diamond Sword is the true mark of a hero and an accomplished adventurer.
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.reinforced_iron: §7favored by the relentless Vindicators of the Arch-Illager's army.
§7The pickaxe has been the iconic tool of adventurers and heroes for as long as anyone can remember.
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.sickle.descript: §7A ceremonial weapon that hails from the same region as the Desert Temple.
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.spooky_sword.de: §7The Sinister Sword, drawn to those who face the spookiest of nights, cuts through the night with a howl.
item.minecraftdungeonsv1.stormlander_gre: §7enchanted with the power of the raging storm
